author: jprendi
body:
Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49938 

#### PR description:

This PR accommodates for the changes in menu introduced through [CMSHLT-3712](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3712) , renaming the path `LocalTestDataScouting` to `DQMTestDataScouting`. We also removed the `onlyScouting` condition everywhere as we now do save the online lumi metadata so it is no longer needed.

#### PR validation:

This PR was developed in `CMSSW_16_0_X_2026-01-25-2300`, using the packages `DQM/Integration` and `DQM/HLTEvF`.

We validated by copying the content of the [DQM-Integration repository](https://github.com/cms-data/DQM-Integration) and then running the following test:

```
cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/scouting_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py runInputDir=DQM-Integration runNumber=398183 scanOnce=True
```

followed by the subsequent inspection of the output histograms. We also tested the workflow via:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l  145.415 -t 4 -j 8
```


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is the backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49938.

---

cc: @mmusich
title: Adapting changes from CMSHLT-3712 for Scouting DQM + removing onlyScouting condition [16_0_X]
